text: ane jyare musa (a.Sa.) Amara samaye avya ane temana palanahare temani sathe vata kari, kahyum he mara palanahara! Mane tane jovani sakti apa, jethi hum tamane eka najara jo'i sakum, kahevamam avyum ke tame mane kayareya nathi jo'i sakata, parantu tame te pahada tarapha jota raho, jo te potani jagya'e ja rahyo, to tame pana mane jo'i sakaso, basa! Temano palanahara te pahada tarapha tajalli batavi to, tena curecura tha'i gaya, ane musa (a.Sa.) Behosa tha'ine padi gaya, ni:Sanka tari hasti pavitra che, hum tari samaksa tauba karu chum ane hum sauthi pahela tara para imana lavavavalo chum
